'''Barry McGovern''' is an Irish actor. He has appeared in well-known films such as ''Joe vs. the Volcano'', ''Far and Away'' and ''Braveheart''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'' he portrayed a [[Dying man (Mockingbird)|dying man]] in the episode "[[Mockingbird]]".
